text:
Terrene (https://www.terrene.co) | Full Stack Developer | FULL-TIME | Waterloo / Kitchener | ONSITE | 70-80K + equity

Terrene is simplifying and automating machine learning for business analysts. With the predictive analytics engine, a business analyst can connect a data set and build a machine learning model in as little as 30 seconds.

We recently landed a contract with a Fortune 100 company that is using Terrene on a daily basis and are looking to expand our team. We are a small team of 3 and you will be joining us as the first full-time employee.

To apply please send your resume to careers@terrene.co
